Articles.Content: I tried to make two custom action groups for an airplane, key "1" for "Engine Cruise Mode" and key "2" for "Engine Revers Mode".  After pressing  key "1" I could no longer change my thrust, in the navball it changed from 100% to zero but my airplane continued accelerating.  Pressing key "2" did do nothing. Tried to reproduce this failure and it seems every time I press key "1" the active throttle freezes and cannot be changed anymore.  Anyone else having such problems?
